cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.12)

set(OPENCV_URL ${TDV_OPENCV_DIR})

set(OPENCV_BINARY_PATH ${TDV_OPENCV_DIR})

if(WIN32 AND CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR STREQUAL "x86_64" OR CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR STREQUAL "AMD64")
	ExternalProject_Add(${3RDPARTY_OPENCV}
	URL ${OPENCV_URL}
	CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_ARGS ""
	BUILD_COMMAND ""
	INSTALL_COMMAND "")
else()
	ExternalProject_Add(${3RDPARTY_OPENCV}
	URL ${OPENCV_URL}
	CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_ARGS ""
	BUILD_COMMAND ""
	INSTALL_COMMAND mkdir -p ${TDV_INSTALL_DIR}/3rdparty && cp -rf ${OPENCV_BINARY_PATH}/. ${TDV_INSTALL_DIR}/3rdparty)
endif()
